title: Biden’s campaign tweets about ‘turning a blind eye’ as his real eye fills with blood during #ClimateTownHall
text:
The timing really couldn’t have been worse for the Biden campaign to send out this tweet.

You see, enough people were distracted by Biden’s eye filling with blood during CNN’s #ClimateTownHall that they didn’t need to draw any more attention to it.

Former VP @JoeBiden appears to have an issue with his eye while on @CNN for their *7-HOUR LONG* #ClimateTownHall. pic.twitter.com/8RmATj5j53 — Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) September 5, 2019

Is he ok Biden's eye fills with blood during CNN climate town hall https://t.co/PhgldCgSnM — Joe Gabriel Simonson (@SaysSimonson) September 5, 2019

In fairness to Biden, everyone who is watching this has blood coming out of their eyes. https://t.co/SUBBVPGDje — Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) September 5, 2019

Who punched Biden in the eye? — Sean Agnew (@seanagnew) September 5, 2019

Why is Biden's eyeball filling up full of blood? — Comfortably Smug (@ComfortablySmug) September 5, 2019

marianne isn’t there so she cast a spell to make a point https://t.co/z0oEG1Bp4v — Ben McDonald (@Bmac0507) September 5, 2019

Biden is picking up the votes of anyone who knows their eyes would fill with blood if forced to sit thru a CNN town hall on climate change. — Just Karl (@justkarl) September 5, 2019

Uh, hey guys. Joe Biden’s eye filled with blood while onstage at the CNN town hall.

This is not a photoshop: pic.twitter.com/kJRHxMP8wc — Benny (@bennyjohnson) September 5, 2019

The Eye of Biden the Terrible few could endure. pic.twitter.com/sTI6EM0Ld6 — Josh Jordan (@NumbersMuncher) September 5, 2019

Individual Biden body parts are now generating their own gaffes https://t.co/4tn6kP5ly8 — Allahpundit (@allahpundit) September 5, 2019

Trump in a debate with Biden: “Did you see him? He had blood coming out of his eyes, out of his whatever.” — Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) September 5, 2019

Hillary is sitting there throwing a rocks glass at the television screaming how she passed out once and it ended her campaign while Biden’s eye fell out on national TV and he’ll still be the frontrunner. — Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) September 5, 2019

Joe Biden can't catch a break – even when he's not saying something screwy his eye fills up with blood. pic.twitter.com/kN7hIciokl — Josh Jordan (@NumbersMuncher) September 5, 2019

Don't play poker against Joe Biden unless you know his tell. pic.twitter.com/5YteVirGDG — Just Karl (@justkarl) September 5, 2019

Joe is watching out for you. pic.twitter.com/TtA5Ouksko — Just Karl (@justkarl) September 5, 2019

This is why you should never watch presidential debates! They advertise themselves as serious discussions about the future of the country but you end up spending the night talking about a senior citizen's glaucoma instead! — John Noonan (@noonanjo) September 5, 2019

This is almost as weird as watching Hillary being chucked into the back of an SUV like a sack of potatoes.

Related:
description: It's probably best not to draw too much attention to Biden's eye at the moment.
